name: Coke and Popcorn - dark and junkless
description:
Based on COKE&POPCORN AT NIGHT.
Intended for the TV section.
Removed lots of junk - targeted especially at the single episode page.
Tailored for people binge-watching using online streaming video links.
Would gladly make it an option to have commercial links or network links shown instead, would anybody be interested in that feature.
